TURTLEWAVE

turtlewave is a Python package for event detections in high-density EEG sleep data, extended from Wonambi to handle large datasets.

Features

  • [List key features]

  • [Feature 2]

  • [Feature 3]

Requirements

  • python >=3.8

  • numpy >=1.17.0

  • scipy >=1.3.0

  • matplotlib>=3.1.0

  • h5py >=2.10.0

  • PyQt5 >=5.12.0

  • wonambi>=7.15
